resources.string: What`s the point of “catch `em all” if you don’t know who are “ `em ” ?
For that, count on me, the pokedex! Your application that lists and filters by name and type. Don`t forget the option to choose a pokemon randomly (good for you to learn about “ `em ” :V)
Remember, you “gotta catch `em all” , while I show “ `em all”
